title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2010 to 2014, gradually increasing from 2014 to 2015, and lastly slightly constant from 2015 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Max Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 11.7 was recorded at Year 2015
Min Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 8.16 was recorded at Year 2012
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2015 to 2018.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012 to 2015.
Likewise, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2010 to 2012.
